subject: Weight Lifting
Olympic Games (2008)
Steroids
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Greek Weightlifting Federation blamed its coach, Christos Iakovou, for the doping scandal that has jeopardized the team’s participation at the Beijing Olympics. Iakovou was suspended last week after 11 Greek weight lifters tested positive for banned substances.
